Comment: Of course you can.  Even allies keep a few secrets, and allies are a great place to get some types of spies some practice before sending them to more challenging assignments.

Comment: Analyzing Greenland using satellites or on-the-ground operatives is not "spying on Greenland" but, essentially, "looking" at Greenland. I'm not sure that Greenland's 57,751 residents really care. Denmark, on the other hand, is afraid of losing ties to the landmass.
